casebody.data:
Joseph JASMAN, Plaintiff-Appellant,
v.
RICHARD A. HANDLON CORRECTIONAL FACILITY WARDEN, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 158624
COA: 344389 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 29, 2019

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the September 11, 2018 order of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the question presented should be reviewed by this Court. The motion to appoint counsel is DENIED.
